sentence: This includes supporting conservative Freedom Caucus members like Reps. Lauren Boebert, R-Colo., and Debbie Lesko, R-Ariz.

title: Duff: Stefanik Is Results Oriented for Conservatives and it Shows

sentence: Arizona far-right Republican U.S. Congresswoman Debbie Lesko made the false claim on the floor of the House of Representatives: Crime is skyrocketing, fentanyl is killing Americans, and what is Biden's response?

title: Right wing website made up viral fake ‘Biden giving out free crack pipes’ claim Republicans like Marco Rubio are now pushing

sentence: Rep. Debbie Lesko, a member of the House Energy and Commerce Committee, has some answers on today’s edition of “The Daily Signal Podcast.” Lesko, R-Ariz., pledges that if the GOP regains the majority in Congress, lawmakers will act swiftly to reduce gas prices and increase America’s energy independence.
author: Douglas Blair
title: Rep. Debbie Lesko Reveals GOP Plan to Lower Gas Prices

sentence: And you wonder why Ron DeSantis, Greg Abbott, and others are so keen to burn math textbooks... Arizona's Republican Congresswoman Debbie Lesko said on Twitter that Border Patrol agents had arrested a billion people at the U.S.-Mexico border over the past six months—wrongly adding three zeros to the correct number of a million people.
author: Ed Scarce
title: AZ Rep Bashed On Twitter, Says A Billion Migrants Apprehended At Border

sentence: 1395 comments Congresswoman Debbie Lesko (R-AZ) faced social media ridicule after she added a few too many zeroes to her warning about the size and scale of illegal immigration.
author: Ken Meyer
title: GOP Rep. Mocked for Claiming a Billion Migrants Were Apprehended on Southern Border: This is What Happens When You ‘Ban Math’

sentence: There are right-wing politicians using extremist talking points to attack Democrats on immigration and the southern border, and then there’s Debbie Lesko.
title: There are lies about migrants and the border, and then there's Arizona Rep. Debbie Lesko

sentence: Congresswoman Debbie Lesko, who represents Arizona's 8th congressional district, hugely overstated the arrest figures in the US over the last six months with an erroneous social media post.
title: Republican says 'one billion people' have been caught at the southern border
